text: An la yindao shei, shei jiu huode zhengdao; ta shi shei mi wu, name, chu ta wai, ni jue buneng wei tamen zhaodao renhe baohu zhe. Fuhuo ri, wo jiang ba tamen you xia you ya you long de paxingzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo shi, wo you gei tamen zengjia lieyan.
